thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Tuesday, 30 Jan 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Pankl Racing Systems FY Revenues Up By 5% To EUR 195.4 Mln​

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Pankl Racing Systems FY Revenues Up By 5% To EUR 195.4 Mln​
text:
Jan 30 (Reuters) - PANKL RACING SYSTEMS AG:
* ‍FY REVENUES INCREASED BY 5% TO EUR195.4M​ * FY EBIT AFTER NON-RECURRING START-UP EXPENSES DECREASED BY 11% TO EUR11.8M
* IN 2018, WE EXPECT REVENUES GROWTH OF AT LEAST 10%, ASSUMPTION BACKED BY A RECORD ORDER BOOK
* ‍WE EXPECT A SIGNIFICANT EARNINGS INCREASE IN 2018​ * ‍US CORPORATE TAX CHANGES CAUSED EXCEPTIONAL TAX EXPENSES OF EUR0.9M​
* FY NET PROFIT AT EUR5.7M AFTER DEDUCTION OF NET INTEREST RESULTS AND TAXES FROM EARNINGS Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Gdynia Newsroom)
